fix.text: I'm excited to engage in a meaningful conversation with you! It would be wonderful to delve into the details of what you're currently working on and explore potential avenues for collaboration. I genuinely believe that by exchanging ideas and perspectives, we can discover synergies and create opportunities to work together towards shared goals or projects. So, please share your thoughts, aspirations, or any specific areas of interest, and let's explore how we can collaborate{" "}

source:
What are you working on ?

I'm excited to engage in a meaningful conversation with you! It would be wonderful to delve into the details of what you're currently working on and explore potential avenues for collaboration. I genuinely believe that by exchanging ideas and perspectives, we can discover synergies and create opportunities to work together towards shared goals or projects. So, please share your thoughts, aspirations, or any specific areas of interest, and let's explore how we can collaborate

source:
---
import '@fontsource-variable/inter'

import Header from "../components/Header/Header.astro";
import Footer from '../components/Footer/Footer.astro';
---

<html lang="en">
    <head>
        <meta charset="utf-8">
        <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
        <title>Santhoshraju.dev</title>
    </head>
    <body class="bg-body w-full h-full bg-center bg-no-repeat bg-cover">
        <Header />
        <slot></slot>
        <Footer />
    </body>
</html>

source:
--- import MySiteLayout from "../layouts/MySiteLayout.astro"; import Skill from '../components/Skill/Skill.astro'; ---

I'm Santhosh Raju, software engineer and tech enthusiasts

I like to Build, Blog and Share stuff I do everyday. I specialise in building Web Application, Websites & Applications that scales. I'm minimalistic in communicaiton channles, but I still would like to connect with everyone. Connect with me on LinkedIn, or check my work on Github.

I design, develop and deploy web applications and productionise Machine Learning Models at scale. Craft I have learned and practiced, and still do, over the past 8 years of my professional career. I have worked with multiple organisations and clients on their path to Digitisation. With Machine Learning & AI products on the rise, I'm now focusing on designing, building Machine Learning and Data Intensive Applications that scales from POC stage to Production.

Also, I love to play with Raspberry Pi's and reading Books, which you will find them in my blogs
